original_text: Then answered they and said before the king, That Daniel, which is of the children of the captivity of Judah, regardeth not thee, O king, nor the decree that thou hast signed, but maketh his petition three times a day.
korean_text: 그들이 왕 앞에서 말하여 이르되 왕이여 사로잡혀 온 유다 자손 중에 다니엘이 왕과 왕의 도장이 찍힌 금령을 존중하지 아니하고 하루 세 번씩 기도하나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Then answered they and said before the king
That Daniel, which is of the children of captivity of Judah
nor the decree that thou hast signed
but maketh his petition three times a day
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하루 세 번씩 기도하기를 그치지 아니하나이다
